body.name: ilvvan Over Sink Dish Drying Rack (Expandable Height/Length) Snap-On Design Large Dish Drainer Stainless Steel Storage Counter Organizer (24" - 35.5" L x 12" W x 19" - 22" H)
deliveryMessages: Or fastest delivery Saturday, February 17. Order within 4 hrs 47 mins
Or fastest pickup Tomorrow, February 16. Order within 15 hrs 2 mins
features: 【Attention 】We double the screws on the 2 crossbars to solve the shaky，bending and uneven problems which were proposed on the reviews in the past! You can find the similar over sink dish rack in other stores using only 2 screws on the crossbar, so they still have these problems

【Tips Before Purchase】Please carefully measure the length of your sink at first. Your Sink Length should be ≤35.5 inches and if it beyond 35.5", please choose our another 3 tier over sink dish rack. Also mind the faucet (Height≤17") and the cabinet (another 15 or 20 inches away from the upper cabinet to place the plates), the height of this rack can be adjusted from 19" to 22", so please make sure you measure your faucet and cabinet so that the dish rack doesn’t touch them or get in the way.
【Material】Stainless steel covered with black Finish. Dual protection ensures no rusting, long lasting durability and easy clean.

【Dimensions】24" - 35.5"(L) x 12"(W) x 19" - 22"(H). The length and Height can be adjusted by the short screws. (Please watch the attached video and you will easily understand the structure and installation steps)

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Ilvvan Expandable Large Over Sink Dish Drying Rack - 3 Main Advantages Expandable Dimensions with DIY Dispaly The length and Height can be adjusted by screws to fit most kitchens. All these parts are removable thus you can DIY them to your preferences. 0 Risk of Rust 201 Stainless steel covered by black baking finish. Extra Large Loading Capacity Better than the traditional dish rack in all respects.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 11, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Counter space saver!
reviews.reviewText: Works perfect for our space! Very sturdy and easy to put together. Love it!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 23, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Does as described
reviews.reviewText: This is a well made product. It clears a good amount of space in a small kitchen. Not cluttered or over done. Simple, sturdy. I also use it for storage. The most frequently used dishes are on it and right at your fingertips when preparing a meal.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 8, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Could be more robust but I like it
reviews.reviewText: * Addendum: Added under counter lights which helped a lot also I'm adding rubber edge protector, like the kind you put on car door edges, to the rims of all the baskets. I grew a little concerned for my ceramic dishes when putting them in the strainer that they may fall over and chip or break on the hard metal edges of the baskets. Not a big deal and I am still loving this strainer...Really like this product though it has some drawbacks. I like all you get for the money though it would be nice if they offered you the ability to buy some of the parts separately. There is room on this rack for more of the components such as I would like another cutlery holder, hooks, cup holder & storage basket. It does have some issues such as it is quite tall even at it's lowest configuration for those of you that are vertically challenged you may want to take this into consideration. Also if you have cabinets on either side of your sink, I put mine up against the cabinets on one side to stabilize it more, make sure you have room. Also if you have an overhead light this may block your light to the sink when it's full of dishes (I'm adding undercounter lights to combat this which I wanted to add anyways). It's nicely adjustable so if you have a window over your sink it can be set up to block as little of it as possible also having your dishes in front of the window allows natural UV light to help sterilize them (an added bonus). This rack could also be more robust, the bars are a little on the thin side, it does stabilize pretty well once completely assembled. I did hear a loud crack from it the first time I used it (it wasn't overloaded either since I didn't have many dishes to wash and just wanted to try it out). I checked all the welds and they seem to be intact so I'm guessing it was just a screwed connection "settling in". I would be nice if the bars were a little bigger with two screws on each end. If you want a good laugh look closely at the pictures of this product some of the hooks seem to be magically floating in the air and the utensils are hanging from the top of the hooks not the bottom. Just a poor morphing job on the pics they faked which is quite common these days. They do show the cutlery holder on the left side with it's knife holder in the back which is not possible with the one I received, not a big deal, either have the knives in the front or put it on the right side which is what I did. There are many possible configuration options with this so find the one that works for you. I do like this product a lot and would buy it again. It cleared up a lot of counter space in my kitchen and made good use of unused space. Anything that helps clean up and organize my kitchen better is alright with me and this rack does a bang up job. Gave it 4 stars which is my highest rating, for something to get 5 stars out of me it better wash my truck and give a good massage as well ;)

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 12, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I love this item it’s sturdy and pretty it was easy to put together for me definitely recommend this

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 3, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Worth every single penny
reviews.reviewText: I’m so happy I purchased this dish drying rack. It’s hold two sink fulls of dishes. We have no space in our kitchen and this saves so much room. It’s well made and holds lots of things. I purchased the double rack and glad to have it for double space but we also have a large family and lots of dishes.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 17, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Space saver and sturdy! It really cleared up my counter and feels like a cleaner look. Felt flimsy when opening, but don't let it fool you, it holds when you assemble it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 25, 2024
reviews.reviewText: This was easy to put together and adjustable to fit in smaller places! Exactly what I was looking for.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 28, 2024
reviews.reviewText: If you have a tiny kitchen this is a great space saver. The only thing I don’t like is the plate area is open on the underside so you can truly only use it for plates and it only comes with a few separators. Also the caddy for my sponges was broke, the welds didn’t hold.
